name: RBDateTime
summary: An Easy Date and Time API for iOS and OS X
description:
Inspired by the `DateTime` and `TimeSpan` classes in .NET/C# Library, 
                   this `RBDateTime` and `RBDuration` classes provide a much easier and 
                   intuitive way to work with date and time values, time zones, and 
                   locale-aware formatting than the Cocoa Foundation API's.
